name: Tentacruel
description: The Jellyfish Pokémon. Its 80 tentacles can stretch and contract freely. They wrap around prey and weaken it with poison.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Other Pokémon's moves or abilities cannot lower this Pokémon stats.

abilities.name: Liquid Ooze
abilities.description: If an enemy uses a leeching or absorb move against this Pokémon, the Pokémon must make a DC 12 CON save or become poisoned.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: In rainy conditions, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency bonus at the end of each of its turns.
